message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product for sale. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that amount.

I understand you're looking to make a deal, Bob, but $1400000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. Considering the value this product holds for you, I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offer and your counteroffer. I'm proposing a new price of $1600000. This is a fair compromise, and I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm proposing a new price of $1550000. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product holds for me, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.
